description.translate: In three stages as in two, we are quickly injured.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Semi Doldro\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7En trois temps comme en deux,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7on est vite blessé.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7In three stages as in two,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7 we are quickly injured.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7攻速§a2 §7飽食§a1 §7恢復§c-1\"}"]}}
